<Text: The Big Shot (1942) is an American film noir crime drama film starring Humphrey Bogart as a crime boss and Irene Manning as the woman he falls in love with.>

<Text: The Big Shot:  Having finally reached stardom with such projects as "The Maltese Falcon" (1941), this would be the last film in which former supporting player Bogart would portray a gangster for Warner Bros.>
